website_summaries.verdict: Shark plushie that can be used over Wi-Fi for voice chat.
pros: With Toymail plushies, you can rest assured that your children aren't talking to strangers – each contact must be accepted by the parent first
cons: The toy snores when not in use, which can be a bit annoying

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt get to sync on android but had no trouble on iphone. On android sometimes it takes a few taps to get it to record a message but over all my kiddo husband and I really enjoy being able to talk to each other anytime. Would recommend purchasing if someone travels or lives far.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA ARANDA

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: My son lives in two different households. I bought this so that he could communicate between his two parents at each home. I couldn't get it to work on multiple wi-fi networks between the two houses. Customer service was virtually non-existent. Instead, they just sent me to their FAQ page. I had no choice but to sent it back for a refund. It's a great idea, and maybe there's a way to make it work, but without real people that you can talk to to work through problems, it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lowbasstone

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Got it together in a short time. Technology impaired Gaga (grandmother). Priceless, grand babies chat with each other and send me messages!! As per the moms they are "joyously marching around." And I am too. LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doent work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It does not work as advertised! you need to be connected in wifi, the sound is not clear and it is ruined every time it is very fragile ...
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to communicate with your grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: This is the most wonderful gift to give children (and yourself!!) because it allows your grandchildren or nieces or nephews to communicate with you by leaving short messages, and you can leave short messages to them. It is easy to use and just hearing those sweet little voices makes your day! I would give it to anyone with a child between 3-10 that you would like to be in touch with. My six year old grandson calls it his communicator, and that's what it is - it allows him to communicate with those he loves without using a phone or smartphone...its just the best! You should go right out and buy it...
customer_reviews.author: Rozz21

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to set up originally. Have to re-sync with my phone all the time. Messages don’t always send. Confusing to use for a young audience which these toys are aimed at. Great idea, I just wish it was executed better.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concept!
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a process! Directions are not spectacular. You only pair your toy to ONE phone and make sure you pair it on the wifi the toy is going to be on all of the time. Once we figured out these little hiccups, and the 15th try pairing it.. it was all set! Now my granddaughter sends us messages and we send her one back. Would have been 5 star if set up wasn't such a process. We really do love it, however!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excited for a new way to keep kiddo connected to family
customer_reviews.text: It took a day before the first "test" message was received but after that the delay seems to be much shorter. The test back (from toy to phone) went pretty quick. Once I get really familiar with the phone app and all the features, I think I'll like it more and more. Looking forward to letting grandma, aunts and uncles send and receive messages! My kiddo is 3 months shy of 3 and she isn't "getting" the back buttons right away but I think with repeated practice she will learn it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevidori

customer_reviews.title: A must have! We love our Gori the Shark
customer_reviews.text: We love the Toymail so much! It has been so awesome for our children as they can send and receive messages to their grandmothers who live states away! It has helped them feel emotionally better when they miss them. Plus they can send Daddy a message while daddy is at work! Their best friend has a Toymail and try message each other back and forth! It's a safe way for our children to stay connected to the most important people in their lives.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for keeping in touch with my 5 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for keeping in touch with my 5 year old nephew and his 8 year old sister. They live in AZ and I am in PA, so they can communicate directly with me. ...and they are thrilled. I look forward to their cute messages. Since my niece likes to keep it in her room at night, it would be great if there were a "sleep mode" option. With a 3 hour time difference, I have to be careful of when I send a message.
customer_reviews.author: BRP

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing idea, although expensive! My son loves it! His daddy will send messages from work. Although it took HOURS to set up, will NOT pair to Android devices. After researching, someone said it would only work on Apple iPad. So that's what we did, and it finally worked! So happy to have it!!!
customer_reviews.author: D&T

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases!
customer_reviews.text: Got his for my nephew who lives 1000 miles away.....awesome way to stay in touch and send short messages to each other! Took a little training to get him to understand usage (he's 6) but now has it figured out and we are able to send daily messages! Warms my heart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is cute and it works
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to set up, and very expensive. Otherwise it is good. I am still waiting to see how well this battery life, and connectivity stay. Kids like them, but we haven’t use it much yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Great way for kids to enjoy contacting love ones without phone access
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6 and she loves her talkie. She can leave me messages when I am at work and it immediately notifies me, then I can leave her messages back. She does need to be near wifi for the Talkie to work.
customer_reviews.author: lea

customer_reviews.title: For the tech savvy tot
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT I LOVE IT I LOVE IT. My kid could less but I think this is the coolest concept. I only wish you made less un-kid un-dirt friendly skins. The light colors and the super soft plush don't go over well with sticky icky ooey fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Mommybee2

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute idea... didn't work. Was never able to sync it. Called twice and left messages, no return call. They did respond to my email. But, only to give me directions that I had already tried. Wish it would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Farah Piehl

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my 2 kids.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these, one for both of my kids. They absolutely love them and it was fairly easy to set up. You have to have a 2.4 ghz network to get it initially connected to the parent phone, but as long as you know how to switch your 5 ghz network to 2.4 then you are fine.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonandBlue

customer_reviews.title: Paid subscription required for most features
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and I got a great deal buying on Amazon rather than Target. Downfall is that it takes regular batteries and being rechargable would be more convenient. Also you have to pay to subscribe for most of the features and for the price of the unit itself that's ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tracilynn Holler

customer_reviews.title: Is the company closed?!
customer_reviews.text: The app doesn't work. My emails got a delivery error. And their help line says they're closed no matter when you call or what options you choose. The toy is worthless without the app. I want a full refund. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect present for any child, especially if you're a parent that works out of town a lot. Soft and cute. Super simple to use. The app needs some work (especially since you can't delete previous messages). Overall, worth what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Boothby

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong selection
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the blue shark for a specific reason and received the green monster looking one...
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids, hard for grandparents.
customer_reviews.text: Super cool! Now my daughter can talk to people all the time, and they can talk back. She's five, and can work it great, she uses it with her cousins and other relatives who live in another country.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonG

customer_reviews.title: The product was fun. Hard to figure out the setup if you ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was fun. Hard to figure out the setup if you have more than one talkie/kid, but customer service responds well. Boys used them a lot for about a month and never pick them up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Keza

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! So easy for my 7yr old son to use and I get his msgs right away. He LOVES receiving new msgs as well. I wish I could figure out why it keeps getting hung up when sending a message. I have to keep reconnecting it to our wifi 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful way to keep in touch with the kiddos. Easy to use and absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Tattoosa

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this my 3 1/2 yr old granddaughter lives too far from me. This helps keep us connected. Just set it up yesterday and have already received 3 messages from her. Daddy says she was mad at him yesterday and said where is my phone (talkie) I'm calling Gramma. I love this :) He also says every time she gets a message he sees her sitting listening and smiling. Best new toy !
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: Worked 5 mins
customer_reviews.text: Great concept for my college daughter to keep in touch with her toner siblings still at home but it only worked for 5 minutes. Hoping I can work with company to fix the issue because my son was really bummed his new gift is a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves getting messages from her cousins and I love getting messages from her
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her talkie! She loves getting messages from her cousins and I love getting messages from her! It was easy set up and easy for her to learn. (She is 4 years old)
customer_reviews.author: Chad van Delden

customer_reviews.title: Working and traveling parents? You NEED this!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 and loves this. As a working mother, as well as traveling parent ....he looks forward to sending messages after school and receiving. He is so proud of himself when he leaves a message and I LOVE when he leaves them and I never expect it. This was truly made for the working parent. It's just a great product. Easy to use. Words quite honestly don't explain how great this is for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A Carrino

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!! Love this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! We got it for my stepdaughter for Christmas and now she can send us messages and we can send them to her whenever we want! The quality is super great too- definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to text my son, but he couldn't read lol
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Mikell

customer_reviews.title: I bought 4 of these for Christmas and they have ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for Christmas and they have not been used once and it is now May!! I cant get them hooked up to any phone or to each other. I wish I could return but my girls tour up the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for out of town parents
customer_reviews.text: I love that my son can still hear my husbands voice everyday when my husband is working out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hart

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Gory
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this so far. It is very easy for our daughter to use and was fairly easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keep in touch toy
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely enjoys this toy It makes communicating with him while I’m at work super easy
customer_reviews.author: Krista Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great way to communicate with your little loved ones
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We saw it on Shark Tank and decided to purchase for our granddaughters that live in Florida so that we could communicate with them directly more frequently from Texas. We talk to them almost every day. We love hearing the excitement from the two and a half year old when she hears our voice. :)
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Dirksen

customer_reviews.title: Not the right character!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shark and received this instead. The shark is one of the biggest reasons why I bought these in the first place. My daughter is obsessed with sharks. I’m super bummed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys love sending me messages at work and I love to hear their little voices.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Meier

customer_reviews.title: fun toy that allows freinds and relatives to talk to ...
customer_reviews.text: fun toy that allows freinds and relatives to talk to the kid and he can talk back. How cool is that?
customer_reviews.author: Ken Heinemann

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Toy was no longer supported and never worked I threw out the “computer “ and kept the shark toy 😩
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Cataldi

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: The batteries will not stay charged more than 2 days. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stan McWaters

customer_reviews.title: TOO MUCH FUN
customer_reviews.text: My niece and I are loving Gory!! The past few days have been cold or snowy and she has been home with Gory. I get to hear her sweet messages while I am at work. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mothers love their gift
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've bought. Mothers love their gift. They feel more connected to their babies.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Peeples

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - way to stay connected for young ones!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 year old and she loves it!! Great way to keep connected with her and her grandparents and family!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: An ok toy, but not the easiest to use and kids don't play with it much.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely happy with the product!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 years old love it! And I like it even more! Great product...Thanks Toymail.
customer_reviews.author: Bellabu Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for traveling parents and long distance families
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great! The whole family is able to leave a message and our daughter can message back. Such cool technology!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it! It's wonderful hearing my grandchildrens voices when ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It's wonderful hearing my grandchildrens voices when they are not near!
customer_reviews.author: Janice G. Colglazier

customer_reviews.title: Can't connect to wifi
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: I finally got the toy setup on our wifi, it was a phone inside a case issue. Waiting to update once we've used it for a while. Previous review: I've tried for 3 hours to connect this toy to the wifi thru my phone. I have an iPhone 6 and I watched all the videos, followed all the steps, read the manual, took the phone out of the case, made the screen as bright as possible, turned all background apps off. There is nothing else I can think to do. I'm very disappointed. I'm waiting for support to connect me since I've emailed them. I'll update whatever happens.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I loved the product after seeing it on shark tank
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product after seeing it on shark tank, I received the item today and I have 3 hours setting it up, I gave up. They should have an easier way to set this up, I don't get that you need to changer your router channel, you need 2.4 gHz not 5gHz. Why they don't create a software easy to connect to any wifi. I am going to try from another WiFi network, if it doesn't work I am going to return it. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Synel

customer_reviews.title: I would never buy again. I purchased 2 of ...
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy again. I purchased 2 of them one for each of my grandsons. They hard hard to set up and we were never able to make them work. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Gesse Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It did not work in Istanbul where my daughter is.... We contacted the support people, but they could not help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: item arrived broken and i can't email anyone to help me return it. total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this as a Christmas gift and it arrived on November 1st. it sat in the package and i wrapped it for my child and he opened it on Christmas day. it doesn't work. we have wasted time and energy trying to make it work. we've used the app and looked online for instructions and i've concluded that it arrived broken. because the return window has expired, i cannot find anyone to complain to or make a return with. i spent $58 on something that is completely broken and i can't find a way to even have a conversation about returning it. do not buy this item. it has been nothing but a ridiculous PIA.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bilotta

product_meta.title: Toymail Talkie - Gory a Shark Plush, Blue
product_meta.description:
Talkies by Toymail are a breakthrough simple way to let kids voice chat with friends and family, without putting them in front of a screen. With Talkies, kids as young as 3 yrs old can send voice messages just by pushing a button. Messages are immediately sent to parent-approved contacts. Grownups use the the free Toymail app for IOS/Android/Kindle to send messages to Talkies. Kids can message their friends Talkie-to-Talkie, too!



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Talk with your kids, without giving them a cell phone Using Talkies is a cinch! Grownups download the free app onto their cell phone, and pair the app with the Talkie. Enter in contacts - parents, grandparents, cousins, etc. From there, kids simply press the smiley face on the back of the Talkie to cycle through their contacts and choose one. Then they press the talk bubble to send a message - it's that simple! It's not only great for parents, but grandparents, friends, cousins, military deployments, and so much more.

Talkies grow and and expand with cloud features The new Toymail Cloud expands your Talkie into so much more than just voice chat. With the cloud, your Talkie can play games like hide and seek, send daily songs and jokes, help your child learn words and numbers, and even help them get to bed, or wake up in the morning. You can also unlock physical play so the Talkie will do things like laugh, snore and say ‘weee!'




Simple, Safe 2-Way Chat  

2-way voice chat with your friends and family. Toys check for new messages on a timed schedule, more often when they’re being played with frequently. Kids can force check messages at any time by pressing a button.



Works Over WIFI  

The free Toymail app for IOS, Android and Kindle lets grownups send messages to WIFI-enabled Talkies right from their phone, and approve friends and family to chat with their child.



Award Winning!  

The press loves Toymail too (and we’re enjoying the spotlight of being a media darling)!

 * Hailed as "genius" by Parents Magazine.
 * “These might be the coolest toys we've ever seen." Brit + Co.
 * USAToday: "One of this year's top tech toys!"






The safe way to chat with kids! Toymail is all about bringing families together. We connect parents to kids, and kids to their friends, in the simplest way possible, without putting kids in front of another screen. Toymail tech goes beyond messaging into expandable content to keep the toys evolving as a child grows and their interest’s change. Our tech is made for physical toys that encourage open-ended, imaginative play.




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Simple, Safe, Communication

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

Kids spend 8 hours a day in front of screens. Parents don’t want to give their children phones when they are young because of safety and security concerns. We intentionally built Toymail to be screen-free for health and safety. Kids can use it on their own, with multiple friends and family members, without the distraction of the smartphone screen.

What makes your product special?

Talkies are the only product on the market that allow kids to send messages back and forth with their family without using a screen. Our tech is made for physical toys that encourage open-ended, imaginative play. We’ve gotten feedback from working parents, divorced parents, parents on military travel, parents who are either in hospitals or have a child in a hospital, grandparents, aunts, uncles, etc. – they all say Toymail was made for them.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Nothing is better than watching kids smile as they use our product, and giving parents the opportunity to connect with their children while they’re at work. Nothing is more gratifying and humbling than knowing we are making a difference in the lives of so many families.
feature_bullets: Toymail Talkie - Gory a Shark Plush, Blue
